catalog.name: JPL Horizons
catalog.description: Accessed via JPL Horizons On-Line Ephemeris System

param.name: Site (lat, lon, alt(in km))
param.description: north or south for Gemini, otherwise lat,lon,alt(in km)

param.name: Start Time (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm)
param.description: Start date in the format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm

param.name: End Time (yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm)
param.description: End date in the format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm

param.name: EPOCH: Julian Date of osculating elements
OM: Longitude of Ascending Node (DEG) wrt ecliptic/equinox
W: Argument of Perihelion (DEG) wrt ecliptic/equinox
IN: Inclination of orbit plane (DEG) wrt ecliptic
